item.title: N2CMS Meet VWT2OC: Day 4 – Wheel Spinning
item.description: Well, Webhost4Life have yet to restore the current site so I can’t work through the develop model/import data/rinse/repeat iterations which I’ll need to ensure a clean migration at the end of the project.  Still at least they’re keeping me updated…and not at all keeping me in the dark with vague promised that someone's working on it.  Bastards. I guess it’s my fault for trusting them to do all the database backups (like they’re paid to do)….
